de.griefed.serverpackcreator

Class ApplicationProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • de.griefed.serverpackcreator.ApplicationProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>

    @Component
public class ApplicationProperties
extends java.util.Properties
    Our properties-class. Extends Properties. Sets up default properties loaded from the local serverpackcreator.properties and allows reloading of said properties if the file has changed.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ApplicationProperties

        @Autowired
public ApplicationProperties()
        Constructor for our properties. Sets a couple of default values for use in ServerPackCreator.

      • getServerPackCreatorVersion

        public java.lang.String getServerPackCreatorVersion()
        Getter for the version of ServerPackCreator.
        If a JAR-file compiled from a release-job from a CI/CD-pipeline is used, it should contain a VERSION.txt-file which contains the version of said release. If a non-release-version is used, from a regular pipeline or local dev-build, then this will be set to dev.
        Returns:
        String. Returns the version of ServerPackCreator.
